plugin.label: waveTerrain
plugin.name: Wave Terrain Oscillator
plugin.p: A Wave Terrain oscillator, taken from Curtis Roads' example in {\em The Computer Music Tutorial}.
Inputs x and y move the cursor around on a 2D landscape "wavetable" that is used to generate the output. The function used is z = (x - y) * (x - 1) * (x + 1) * (y - 1) * (y + 1).
